0.30.name: wordpress/network-blog-manager
0.30.description:
Network Blog Manager aspire to be the perfect companion of every Super Administrator of a WP Blog's Network.

With Network Blog Manager you can find easily every blog in your network due an internal search engine. Then you can contact the administrator and have a quick overlook of the number of contents (posts, pages, comments) each blog has.

Extensible with an internal plugin support: you can build your own functionality!
